title: Atmospheric Music pack
description: 12 loopable tracks of atmospheric and ambient music (YOUTUBE AND STREAMING SAFE). Whatever genre your game is, this is the music pack you're looking for!
longDescription:
🎧 LISTEN TO THE FULL MUSIC PACK HERE.


All tracks are YouTube and Streaming safe! No need to worry about copyright strikes :)


This music pack contains 12 loopable tracks of atmospheric and ambient music (total of 19 minutes). Whatever genre your game is, this is the music pack you're looking for! Featuring various instruments and synths, this Atmospheric Music Pack is sure to have the perfect ambient sound to bring your video game to the next level.

 

Potential uses for these tracks:

  • Exploration
  • Open-world levels
  • Ambience
  • Menus
  • Loading screens

 

*** This music pack will be continually updated with new tracks! Sign up to my mailing list to be notified of all updates. ***

 

TRACKLIST (.wav, 44.1kHz, 16bit)

  1. Backyard Sunset (LOOP) [2:00]
  2. Ocean Wind (LOOP) [1:00]
  3. Alone (LOOP) [1:00]
  4. Lost in Time (LOOP) [1:30]
  5. Atmos of Earth (LOOP) [1:00]
  6. Ice of Neptune (LOOP) [1:00]
  7. Silence of Mars (LOOP) [1:00]
  8. Exploring (LOOP) [2:00]
  9. The Cavern (LOOP) [3:00]
  10. Somber Evening (LOOP) [2:00]
  11. Waiting (LOOP) [2:00]
  12. Wonders (LOOP) [1:30]
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 12 loopable original high-quality WAV tracks (44.1 kHz / 16-bit)
  • 19 minutes of music
  • YouTube-Safe music tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License

Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 19 minutes

Supported Engine Versions: 4.0 and later

Supported Development Platforms: Android, Gear VR, HoloLens 2, HTML5, iOS, Linux, MacOS, Nintendo Switch, Oculus, PlayStation 4, Steam VR, Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Xbox One
